properties.Description: Clearing the site and stripping top soil/1:3:6 (40mm) concrete manual mix (volume batching)/Miscellaneous/Contingancies 10%

properties.Observation: Water is taken from the keppetoyawa canal. There is no catchpit or water filtering system.
properties.Description: Construction of 1.0m x 1.0m x 0.6m catchpit/Common excavation for foundation or quarry materials and haul the surplus up to 30m by Manually./Plywood form work including making, fixing & removing for structure -05 uses/1:3:6 (40mm) concrete manual mix (volume batching)/Cover slabs/1:2:4 (20mm) concrete manual mix  (volume batching)/Cutting, Bending & Placing tor steel reinforcement bars/Vegetative cover improving for narrow strips (1.5m-2.0m wide) with Arecanut seedlings at 1.5m spacing in 2 rows, Betel plants VP at 3m spacing in 1 row, Green gram as a cover crop/Miscellaneous/Contingancies 10%

properties.Observation: A well has been constructed using RRM (L=1.8m, W=1.0m, H=1.0m).  Water is leaking from the well and the boundaries are not marked.
properties.Description: Construction of curtain wall (0.075mm thk) with 1:2:4 (3/4") concrete, 1/2" dowels at 600mm x 600mm intervals and embedded with chicken mesh/Plaster 12mm thick in 1:3 cement and sand finished smooth with gray cement floating/Vegetative cover improving around structures (5m x 10m) with planting Arecanut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, and planting Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings in 3.5m x 3.5 m grid/Miscellaneous/Contingancies 10%

properties.Observation: A pit has been built using stones and soil. There are no boundaries.
properties.Description: Supplying of 1200mm Dia x 2.44m long Hume Pipes/Loading and Unloading 1200mm diameter 2.44m Long HumePipes/Common excavation for foundation or quarry materials and haul the surplus up to 30m by Manually./150mm x 225mm Random Rubble masonry work in 1:5 cement and sand mortar in structures/Plaster 12mm thick in 1:3 cement and sand finished smooth with gray cement floating/1:3:6 (40mm) concrete manual mix (volume batching)/Vegetative cover improving around structures (5m x 10m) with planting Arecanut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, and planting Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings in 3.5m x 3.5 m grid/Miscellaneous/Contingancies 10%

properties.Observation: Water is obtained from the Kirigahamula Ella canal where the spring water flows. There is no catchpit or water filtering system. Water is consumed irregularly.
Water obtained from kokka oya. There is pump house, stock tank, filtering system. It is a well-functioning water scheme. The boundaries are marked.

properties.Observation: There is a stock tank but no formal water filtration system. Boundaries are not marked. It is  also advisable to construct establish a water filtration system and install water meter for the water consumers to prevent water wastage.
